CREATE DATABASE tran_db;
CREATE USER 'demo2'@'1.200.%' IDENTIFIED BY 'ZGVtbzI=';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON tran_db.* TO 'demo2'@'1.200.%';

use tran_db;
CREATE TABLE tran (  #
  id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, # ID
  Info varchar(8000),  # 
  Taibj varchar(500),  # 
  PRIMARY KEY(id)      # 
);

docker run --name consensus -p 58005:8080 -d ianyang66/consensus
docker run --name mysql-8.0.20 -p 13317:13316 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=demo2 -d mysql:13317
docker run --name mysql-8.0.20 -p 13317:13316 -d mysql:1337

solcjs C:/Users/wealt/eclipse-workspace/CCconsensus/InfoContract.sol --bin --abi --optimize -o C:/Users/wealt/eclipse-workspace/CCconsensus/

web3j generate solidity -a C:\Users\wealt\eclipse-workspace\CCconsensus\InfoContract.abi -b C:\Users\wealt\eclipse-workspace\CCconsensus\InfoContract.bin -o C:/Users/wealt/eclipse-workspace/CCconsensus -p CCconsensus


export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/java/jdk1.8.0_202
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
export CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/lib:$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar:$CLASSPATH

$ sudo mkdir /usr/local/eclipse
$ sudo cp eclipse-jee-2021-12-R-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz /usr/local/eclipse/
$ cd /usr/local/eclipse/
$ sudo tar -xvzf eclipse-jee-2021-12-R-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz


$ cd /usr/local/eclipse/eclipse/
$ sudo ln -s /usr/local/java/jdk1.8.0_202/jre/ jre
